sections.heading: REFUND & CANCELLATION POLICY
sections.body:
## Refund and Cancellation Policy

For details on our refund and cancellation policy, please visit [this link](https://cyberizegroup.com/refund-cancellation-policy/).

sections.heading: CHARGEBACK POLICY
sections.body:
```markdown
## Payment Agreement Summary

- **Payment Method**: Credit Card
- **Chargeback Waiver**: 
  - Client permanently waives the right to initiate a chargeback once services commence.
  - Initiating a chargeback is considered a material violation of the agreement.
  
- **Consequences of Chargeback**:
  - Chargeback results in damages to Cyberize Group that are difficult to quantify.
  - Client acknowledges that initiating a chargeback constitutes fraud.

- **Liability**: 
  - Client agrees to cover all costs incurred by Cyberize Group related to chargebacks.

### Call to Action
- Ensure understanding of these terms before proceeding with payment.
```

sections.heading: AUTOMATIC RENEWAL SERVICE AGREEMENT
sections.body:
```markdown
## Automatic Renewal Service

- **Overview**: Your purchase may include enrollment in our automatic renewal service, ensuring uninterrupted access to your membership, pre-paid services, workshop materials, or online courses.
- **How It Works**: Renewal fees will be automatically charged to your payment method on file before expiration, requiring no action from you.
- **Cancellation**: If you are on an ongoing support agreement, you can cancel this service anytime by contacting us at **(800) 983-0668**. 
- **Important Note**: Cancellation may incur fees. Please refer to your agreement for specific details.
```

sections.heading: PROJECT ABANDONMENT POLICY
sections.body:
```markdown
## Project Pause Policy

- **Client Unresponsiveness**: If the Client is unresponsive for **14 days**, we may pause the project.
- **Resuming Work**: Projects will resume only when service bandwidth is available.
- **Re-Start Fee**: A **2% administrative re-start fee** based on the project budget is required before rescheduling.
  
**Last Updated**: February 16, 2018

## Contact Information
- **Address**: 3110 Hatton St, Sarasota, FL
- **Phone**: [(800) 983-0668](tel:+18009830668)
- ![Google Maps Preview](https://privacy-proxy-server.usercentrics.eu/googleMaps?center=NaN,NaN&size=1000x500&zoom=12)
```

sections.heading: This third party embed for Google Maps is being blocked
sections.body:
```markdown
## Summary of Google Maps Service Consent

To load the Google Maps service, your consent is required. Please click 'Accept' to enable this third-party feature.

### Important Notes:
- The service cannot load due to undisclosed trackers.
- **Action Required:** The website owner must include this service in their Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire via their Termageddon account. After updating and submitting, the service will load based on user consent.

### More Information
```
